text: Bethnal Green is an area in East London. It is in the borough of Tower Hamlets, in London, United Kingdom.https://www.towerhamlets.gov.uk/Documents/Borough_statistics/Ward_profiles/Bethnal_Green.pdf ==History== Bethnal Green has a wide history. It was the place where over 150 people lost their lives in the underground. This was the worst civilian casualty number in the whole of World War II.https://stairwaytoheavenmemorial.org/ ==References== Category:Areas of London
title: Bethnal Green
